title: NYC top health official refers to White women as 'birthing people,' calls Black and Hispanic women 'mothers' - Fox News
content: NYC top health official refers to White women as 'birthing people,' calls Black and Hispanic women 'mothers'  Fox NewsView Full Coverage on Google News
description: A top health official in New York City is facing backlash after a series of tweets she posted calling white mothers “birthing people” and minority mothers “mothers."
